headline: Samsung's latest foldables are thinner, lighter, and put Apple on notice
summary: Samsung's latest Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 are lighter, thinner and give foldables new life.

raw.headline: Samsung's latest foldables are thinner, lighter, and put Apple on notice

headline: EnduroSat Announces the Appointment of Paul "Rusty" Thomas as CEO of EnduroSat USA
summary: DENVER, July 09, 2025--EnduroSat, a leading satellite infrastructure builder, today announced the appointment of Paul "Rusty" Thomas as the Chief Executive Officer of EnduroSat USA. In this role, he’ll establish key customer partnerships in support of EnduroSat’s goal of providing fixed-cost and highly configurable end-to-end space services to the US market.

headline: Motorola : Launches WAVE PTX for Peruvian Companies
summary: Instant workgroup communication solution offers push-to-talk voice and data, allowing employees to stay connected, no matter where they are and which device or network they are using ...
